title: Companion Approval Guide
content: quirement/s: Don't kill Fezzerk's Crew at the Windmill where Barcus Wroot is strapped on. Gain entry to Moonrise Towers Don't attack the characters Wyll +Karlach + Astarion - Fezzerk Moonrise Towers - Main Floor Show mercy on the goblins by setting them free. Infiltrate Moonrise Towers Requirement/s: Gain entry to Moonrise Towers Don't attack the characters Karlach + Astarion -Lae'zel -Halsin - Fezzerk Moonrise Towers - Main Floor Reject the soul coins being passed along by Flo through Lann Tarv
